text: Chris Reed (July 7, 1989 – March 14, 2020) was an American-born Japanese ice dancer. With his sister Cathy Reed, he became a seven-time Japanese national champion (2008–2011, 2013–2015) and the 2011 Asian Winter Games silver medalist. They competed at two Winter Olympics (2010, 2014) and reached the final segment at nine ISU Championships. On March 14, 2020, Reed died of sudden cardiac arrest in Detroit, Michigan at the age of 30. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Olympians for the United States Category:Japanese figure skaters Category:American figure skaters Category:People from Kalamazoo, Michigan Category:Sportspeople from Detroit Category:Sportspeople from New Jersey Category:People from Hackensack, New Jersey
title: Chris Reed (figure skater)
